page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: People in Tomintoul work in a variety of occupations. Quite a few are employed in the hotels and shops in the village. There are four food shops, a woodcarver's, a weaver's, and a pottery shop. There are four hotels in Tomintoul. They are The Gordon Arms, The Richmond Arms, The Glenavon and The White Heather. In the spring of 1984, The White Heather was badly damaged by fire. There are two farms near the village. One is Findron and the other is Fordmouth. Also three distilleries employ people from our village. They are Tamnavoulin, Tomintoul and The Glenlivet.
